member.name: PSS_PERFORMANCE_COUNTERS
member.summary: Holds performance counters returned by PssQuerySnapshot.

member.name: PSS_PERFORMANCE_COUNTERS.TotalCycleCount
member.summary: The count of clock cycles spent for capture.

member.name: PSS_PERFORMANCE_COUNTERS.TotalWallClockPeriod
member.summary: The count of units spent for capture.

member.name: PSS_PERFORMANCE_COUNTERS.VaCloneCycleCount
member.summary: The count of clock cycles spent for the capture of the VA clone.

member.name: PSS_PERFORMANCE_COUNTERS.VaCloneWallClockPeriod
member.summary: The count of units spent for the capture of the VA clone.

member.name: PSS_PERFORMANCE_COUNTERS.VaSpaceCycleCount
member.summary: The count of clock cycles spent for the capture of VA space information.

member.name: PSS_PERFORMANCE_COUNTERS.VaSpaceWallClockPeriod
member.summary: The count of units spent for the capture VA space information.

member.name: PSS_PERFORMANCE_COUNTERS.AuxPagesCycleCount
member.summary: The count of clock cycles spent for the capture of auxiliary page information.

member.name: PSS_PERFORMANCE_COUNTERS.AuxPagesWallClockPeriod
member.summary: The count of units spent for the capture of auxiliary page information.

member.name: PSS_PERFORMANCE_COUNTERS.HandlesCycleCount
member.summary: The count of clock cycles spent for the capture of handle information.

member.name: PSS_PERFORMANCE_COUNTERS.HandlesWallClockPeriod
member.summary: The count of units spent for the capture of handle information.

member.name: PSS_PERFORMANCE_COUNTERS.ThreadsCycleCount
member.summary: The count of clock cycles spent for the capture of thread information.

member.name: PSS_PERFORMANCE_COUNTERS.ThreadsWallClockPeriod
member.summary: The count of units spent for the capture of thread information.
